How many people are affected by spondylothoracic dysostosis ?,"Spondylothoracic dysostosis affects about one in 200,000 people worldwide. However, it is much more common in people of Puerto Rican ancestry, affecting approximately one in 12,000 people.",GHR,spondylothoracic dysostosis
